Package com.intellij.openapi.ui

Interface ComboBoxPopupState<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SdkListModel

    public interface ComboBoxPopupState<T>
    A ComboBox's model may implement that interface to handle a custom sub-popup to be shown for some ComboBox elements.
    All elements of the ComboBox and it's sub-popups has to have the same element type to be able to re-use the ComboBox configured presenter
    Note, it is necessary to call com.intellij.openapi.ui.ComboBox#setSwingPopup(false) before to activate the checks and to allow JBPopup to be used
    See Also:
    DarculaJBPopupComboPopup

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasSubstep(T selectedValue)
      In addition to the onChosen(Object) is it possible to show the sub-popup on a mouse hover, without an explicit click.
      javax.swing.ListModel<T> onChosen(T selectedValue)
      This method is called on the ComboBoxModel instance of the combobox to decide if there is next step needed or not.

    • Method Detail

      • onChosen

        javax.swing.ListModel<T> onChosen(T selectedValue)
        This method is called on the ComboBoxModel instance of the combobox to decide if there is next step needed or not.
        Return null if there is no sup-pupup to be shown. That would mean the JComboBox.setSelectedItem(Object) is executed with the same parameter.
        A non-null value would mean a sub-popup to be created. The sub-popup will use the same element type and the same renderer as the original ComboBox. The returned object will be checked again to implement this interface.
        Parameters:
        selectedValue - the selected item.
        Returns:
        new model to show sub-popup or null to accept the suggested element.

      • hasSubstep

        boolean hasSubstep(T selectedValue)
        In addition to the onChosen(Object) is it possible to show the sub-popup on a mouse hover, without an explicit click.
        Returns:
        true to allow that.
